article.title: DRS to Support Digital Fire Control System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: DRS Tactical Systems, Melbourne, Florida, was awarded a $21,987,288 firm-fixed-price contract for the design, development and integration services in support of the M777A2 digital fire control system. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
